Migration.Name: Add IsColorColumn to AD_Column to allow tabs to show rows wi

PO.Data: The Color Column value should be a numeric. A value of zero will appear have the default color (black). A negative value will use the "issue" color, typically red. A positive value will use the "OK" color, typically green or blue.
Is this field to be used to change the color of the displayed data in the row?
